channel.title: RazanScape ★Staff Needed★Highscores★Duo Slayer★Boss Pets★Iron Man Mode★
channel.description:
[CENTER]RazanScape is a Runescape Private Server aimed at entertainment. Made by players, for players, RazanScape aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for it's players with features that the community wants, rather than the development team. [/CENTER] [CENTER][SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS] [B]The server is online for about 3 days now! [/B] Press on the sites Website: http://razanscape.com [URL=http://dl.dropbox.com/s/2jqu1xz7a6splyf/RazanScape.jar?dl=0"]Client Download[/URL][/FONT][/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=2][B]Features:
24/7 Uptime - VPS Hosted - NO LAG! 10+ bosses 4 Game Modes All skills working Jad Pet! 5 Fun Minigames Cool donator benefits! Helpful Staff 4 Different Game Modes Duel Arena 108 Data Gonna be upgraded to 114 Skill point shop for skillers Unique Thieving Shop Duo Slayer Pest Control Glod Ice Queen Cerberus OSRS buddy interface Custom Donator Bosses FullScreen! Barbarian Assault All Skills Working Except Hunter Highscores Voting Increased Drop Rates For People. Clue Scroll System Over 100 unique acheivments! Boss Pets! VPS HOSTED 24/7 Abyssal Bludgeon Working Specs On All The New Items Hardcore PVM server! Wildy Agility Course! Daily Events! Staff Is Needed! Bounty Hunter! Iron Man Mode! And More![/B][/SIZE][/B]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][CENTER]Media!
Will upload more media later![/CENTER]
[CENTER][img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5521671/40612efcf29483c2f33fea37620d1360.png[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/211n6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/29bkk29.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/5d9p35.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5521512/2603caa5bd49da62a397e5059179af89.png[/img][/CENTER]
